General.Name: Goodway Machine Corp
General.Description: Goodway Machine Corp. manufactures and sells CNC lathes in Taiwan. The company provides multi-axis, vertical, horizontal, swiss, and wheel turning products; grinders; and automation turning products, including bar feeders, gantry loading systems, loading and unloading systems, parts catchers and probes, tool presetter, and steady rests. It offers its products through a network of dealers in Asia, the Americas, Africa, Europe, and Oceania. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
